<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a5ca4c7ea43e08e07577cb9024b1f769f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a5ca4c7ea43e08e07577cb9024b1f769f">HexagonDAGToDAGISel::tryLoadOfLoadIntrinsic</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadsdnode">LoadSDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The intrinsics for load circ/brev perform two operations:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 Load a value V from the specified location, using the addressing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    mode corresponding to the intrinsic.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 Store V into a specified location. This location is typically a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    local, temporary object.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In many cases, the program using these intrinsics will immediately</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// load V again from the local object. In those cases, when certain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// conditions are met, the last load can be removed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function identifies and optimizes this pattern. If the pattern</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cannot be optimized, it returns nullptr, which will cause the load</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to be selected separately from the intrinsic (which will be handled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in SelectIntrinsicWChain).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Ch = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getOperand(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assume that the load and the intrinsic are connected directly with a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chain:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   t1: i32,ch = int.load ..., ..., ..., Loc, ...    // &lt;-- C</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   t2: i32,ch = load t1:1, Loc, ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = Ch.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110afc09e0bddd693dcf9923e4df42473bd9">ISD::INTRINSIC&#95;W&#95;CHAIN</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transform: (load ch (add x (and (srl y c) Mask)))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        to: (load ch (add x (shl (srl y d) d-c)))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// where</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask = 00..0 111..1 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//          |     |     +-- d-c 0s, and d-c is 0, 1 or 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//          |     +-------- 1s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//          +-------------- at most c 0s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Motivating example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DAG combiner optimizes (add x (shl (srl y 5) 2))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                     to (add x (and (srl y 3) 1FFFFFFC))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which results in a constant-extended and(##...,lsr). This transformation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// undoes this simplification for cases where the shl can be folded into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an addressing mode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HexagonDAGToDAGISel::ppAddrRewriteAndSrl(std::vector&lt;SDNode&#42;&gt; &amp;&amp;Nodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><Highlight kind="normal">  SelectionDAG &amp;DAG = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : Nodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Addr must match: (add x T0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Addr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getNodes = &#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93;() -&gt; std::vector&lt;SDNode &#42;&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><Highlight kind="normal">    PreprocessHvxISelDAG();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transform: (or (select c x 0) z)  -&gt;  (select c (or x z) z)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//            (or (select c 0 y) z)  -&gt;  (select c z (or y z))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><Highlight kind="normal">  ppSimplifyOrSelect0(getNodes());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transform: (store ch val (add x (add (shl y c) e)))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        to: (store ch val (add x (shl (add y d) c))),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// where e = (shl d c) for some integer d.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The purpose of this is to enable generation of loads/stores with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shifted addressing mode, i.e. mem(x+y&lt;&lt;#c). For that, the shift</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value c must be 0, 1 or 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><Highlight kind="normal">  ppAddrReorderAddShl(getNodes());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transform: (load ch (add x (and (srl y c) Mask)))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        to: (load ch (add x (shl (srl y d) d-c)))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// where</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask = 00..0 111..1 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//          |     |     +-- d-c 0s, and d-c is 0, 1 or 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//          |     +-------- 1s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//          +-------------- at most c 0s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Motivating example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DAG combiner optimizes (add x (shl (srl y 5) 2))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                     to (add x (and (srl y 3) 1FFFFFFC))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which results in a constant-extended and(##...,lsr). This transformation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// undoes this simplification for cases where the shl can be folded into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an addressing mode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><Highlight kind="normal">  ppAddrRewriteAndSrl(getNodes());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transform: (op ... (zext i1 c) ...) -&gt; (select c (op ... 0 ...)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                                                  (op ... 1 ...))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><Highlight kind="normal">  ppHoistZextI1(getNodes());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a96da5708e20bbbc59324f0985bd9df30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagondagtodagisel/#a96da5708e20bbbc59324f0985bd9df30">HexagonDAGToDAGISel::DetectUseSxtw</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This (complex pattern) function is meant to detect a sign-extension</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// i32-&gt;i64 on a per-operand basis. This would allow writing single</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// patterns that would cover a number of combinations of different ways</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a sign-extensions could be written. For example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (mul (DetectUseSxtw x) (DetectUseSxtw y)) -&gt; (M2&#95;dpmpyss&#95;s0 x y)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// could match either one of these:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (mul (sext x) (sext&#95;inreg y))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (mul (sext-load &#42;p) (sext&#95;inreg y))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (mul (sext&#95;inreg x) (sext y))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The returned value will have type i64 and its low word will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contain the value being extended. The high bits are not specified.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The returned type is i64 because the original type of N was i64,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but the users of this function should only use the low-word of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// result, e.g.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  (mul sxtw:x, sxtw:y) -&gt; (M2&#95;dpmpyss&#95;s0 (LoReg sxtw:x), (LoReg sxtw:y))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.getValueType() != MVT::i64)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><Highlight kind="normal">  WeightedLeaf Mul1, Mul2;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><Highlight kind="normal">  WeightedLeaf GA;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not try to factor out a shift if there is already a shift at the tip of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><Highlight kind="normal">  SmallDenseMap&lt;SDValue, int&gt; NodeHeights;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Imbalanced = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Child = Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &amp;&amp; RootWeights.count(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CASE 1: Child is a root note</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2128"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a> = RootWeights&#91;Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2129"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Weight == -1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2130"><Highlight kind="normal">        Child = balanceSubTree(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2131"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calculateWeight(Child.getNode());</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2132"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a> = getWeight(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2133"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Weight == -2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2134"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whoops, this node was RAUWd by one of the balanceSubTree calls we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2135"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// made. Our worklist isn&#39;t up to date anymore.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2136"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Restart the whole process.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2137"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;--&gt; Subtree was RAUWd. Restarting...\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2138"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> balanceSubTree(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, TopLevel);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2139"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2141"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeHeights&#91;Child&#93; = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurrentWeight += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2144"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PowerOf2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2145"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TopLevel &amp;&amp; !CanFactorize &amp;&amp; !HaveTopLevelShift &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2146"><Highlight kind="normal">          (Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad8aec9273962cf78d087090c11a1dd1c">ISD::MUL</a> || Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><Highlight kind="normal">          Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a342c0d4e8e59b30daefe9a05bc2098bd">hasOneUse</a>() &amp;&amp; (PowerOf2 = <a href="#ab0240a68d7340353c85a26853b20b471">getPowerOf2Factor</a>(Child))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2148"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to identify two factorizable MUL/SHL children greedily. Leave</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them out of the priority queue for now so we can deal with them</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Mul1.Value.getNode()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"><Highlight kind="normal">          Mul1 = WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2153"><Highlight kind="normal">          MaxPowerOf2 = PowerOf2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2154"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2155"><Highlight kind="normal">          Mul2 = WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2156"><Highlight kind="normal">          MaxPowerOf2 = std::min(MaxPowerOf2, PowerOf2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Our addressing modes can only shift by a maximum of 3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxPowerOf2 &gt; 3)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><Highlight kind="normal">            MaxPowerOf2 = 3;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><Highlight kind="normal">          CanFactorize = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2164"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><Highlight kind="normal">        Leaves.push(WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="#aef5780c081044f78cc93135f94d56d6a">isOpcodeHandled</a>(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CASE 2: Child is an unhandled kind of node (e.g. constant)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a> = getWeight(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeHeights&#91;Child&#93; = getHeight(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurrentWeight += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#ae5642654641fb0ac7a884206ae74c967">isTargetConstant</a>(Child) &amp;&amp; !GA.Value.getNode())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><Highlight kind="normal">        GA = WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><Highlight kind="normal">        Leaves.push(WeightedLeaf(Child, Weight, InsertionOrder++));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CASE 3: Child is a subtree of same opcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Visit children first, then flatten.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChildOpcode = Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ChildOpcode == NOpcode ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><Highlight kind="normal">             (NOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad8aec9273962cf78d087090c11a1dd1c">ISD::MUL</a> &amp;&amp; ChildOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Convert SHL to MUL</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Op1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ChildOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><Highlight kind="normal">        Op1 = getMultiplierForSHL(Child.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><Highlight kind="normal">        Op1 = Child-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NodeHeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(Op1) || !NodeHeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(Child-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(0))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!NodeHeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(Child) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Parent visited before children?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Visit children first, then re-visit this node</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><Highlight kind="normal">        Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Child);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><Highlight kind="normal">        Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Op1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><Highlight kind="normal">        Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Child-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(0));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Back at this node after visiting the children</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::abs(NodeHeights&#91;Op1&#93; - NodeHeights&#91;Child-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(0)&#93;) &gt; 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><Highlight kind="normal">          Imbalanced = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeHeights&#91;Child&#93; = std::max(NodeHeights&#91;Op1&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      NodeHeights&#91;Child-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a8388f666d6e735f35837ad03ed1f7a7a">getOperand</a>(0)&#93;) + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;--&gt; Current height=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; NodeHeights&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, 0)&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; weight=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; CurrentWeight</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; imbalanced=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Imbalanced &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transform MUL(x, C &#42; 2^Y) + SHL(z, Y) -&gt; SHL(ADD(MUL(x, C), z), Y)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  This factors out a shift in order to match memw(a&lt;&lt;Y+b).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CanFactorize &amp;&amp; (<a href="#a52e0a0634f9ecde5ce054d6d6bcd2761">willShiftRightEliminate</a>(Mul1.Value, MaxPowerOf2) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="#a52e0a0634f9ecde5ce054d6d6bcd2761">willShiftRightEliminate</a>(Mul2.Value, MaxPowerOf2))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;--&gt; Found common factor for two MUL children!\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a> = Mul1.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/weight/#af6d6f33b83e5ef8cd04b509149ad7b79">Weight</a> + Mul2.Weight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Height = std::max(NodeHeights&#91;Mul1.Value&#93;, NodeHeights&#91;Mul2.Value&#93;) + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Mul1Factored = factorOutPowerOf2(Mul1.Value, MaxPowerOf2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Mul2Factored = factorOutPowerOf2(Mul2.Value, MaxPowerOf2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Sum = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>, SDLoc(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>), Mul1.Value.getValueType(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  Mul1Factored, Mul2Factored);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx/#a33cca915c8026e43ecc98a96089a6b86a78523d34068fb7d8996627878dd5ba19">Const</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getConstant(MaxPowerOf2, SDLoc(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        Mul1.Value.getValueType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#a851a17f7dc73f9988807242926dcc645a03c2e7e41ffc181a4e84080b4710e81e">New</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>, SDLoc(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>), Mul1.Value.getValueType(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  Sum, Const);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><Highlight kind="normal">    NodeHeights&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#a851a17f7dc73f9988807242926dcc645a03c2e7e41ffc181a4e84080b4710e81e">New</a>&#93; = Height;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><Highlight kind="normal">    Leaves.push(WeightedLeaf(New, Weight, Mul1.InsertionOrder));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Mul1.Value.getNode()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We failed to factorize two MULs, so now the Muls are left outside the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// queue... add them back.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><Highlight kind="normal">    Leaves.push(Mul1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Mul2.Value.getNode())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><Highlight kind="normal">      Leaves.push(Mul2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><Highlight kind="normal">    CanFactorize = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Combine GA + Constant -&gt; GA+Offset, but only if GA is not used elsewhere</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and the root node itself is not used more than twice. This reduces the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// amount of additional constant extenders introduced by this optimization.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CombinedGA = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a> &amp;&amp; GA.Value.getNode() &amp;&amp; Leaves.hasConst() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><Highlight kind="normal">      GA.Value.hasOneUse() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;use&#95;size() &lt; 3) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><Highlight kind="normal">    GlobalAddressSDNode &#42;GANode =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;GlobalAddressSDNode&gt;</a>(GA.Value.getOperand(0));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><Highlight kind="normal">    ConstantSDNode &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantSDNode&gt;</a>(Leaves.top().Value);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (getUsesInFunction(GANode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globaladdresssdnode/#aac749351927cd1732994a39d40fdd4f2">getGlobal</a>()) == 1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>-&gt;hasOneUse() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#af5bffbb8254140e8679a9b7c0766f9e2">getTargetLowering</a>()-&gt;isOffsetFoldingLegal(GANode)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;--&gt; Combining GA and offset (&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><Highlight kind="normal">                        &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>-&gt;getSExtValue() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;): &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2252"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(GANode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a1f4346248feeb9d5c83ce930555936d1">dump</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2254"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> NewTGA =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2255"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getTargetGlobalAddress(GANode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globaladdresssdnode/#aac749351927cd1732994a39d40fdd4f2">getGlobal</a>(), SDLoc(GA.Value),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2256"><Highlight kind="normal">            GANode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#ac0a534d63ac5c5b87f36acdade953fbe">getValueType</a>(0),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2257"><Highlight kind="normal">            GANode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globaladdresssdnode/#a28a0dd6ccd1cfe2a3d171685b02adab2">getOffset</a>() + (uint64&#95;t)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>-&gt;getSExtValue());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2258"><Highlight kind="normal">      GA.Value = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getNode(GA.Value.getOpcode(), SDLoc(GA.Value),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2259"><Highlight kind="normal">          GA.Value.getValueType(), NewTGA);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2260"><Highlight kind="normal">      GA.Weight += Leaves.top().Weight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2261"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2265"><Highlight kind="normal">      Leaves.pop(); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remove the offset constant from the queue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2266"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2267"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2270"><Highlight kind="normal">      (<a href="#a7873389389f971c6d097f882cf90d320">RebalanceOnlyImbalancedTrees</a> &amp;&amp; !Imbalanced)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2271"><Highlight kind="normal">    RootWeights&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>&#93; = CurrentWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2272"><Highlight kind="normal">    RootHeights&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>&#93; = NodeHeights&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, 0)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2273"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2275"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2276"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2277"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Combine GA + SHL(x, C&lt;=31) so we will match Rx=add(#u8,asl(Rx,#U5))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2278"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a> &amp;&amp; GA.Value.getNode()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2279"><Highlight kind="normal">    WeightedLeaf <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">SHL</a> = Leaves.findSHL(31);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2280"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">SHL</a>.Value.getNode()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2281"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Height = std::max(NodeHeights&#91;GA.Value&#93;, NodeHeights&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">SHL</a>.Value&#93;) + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2282"><Highlight kind="normal">      GA.Value = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>, SDLoc(GA.Value),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2283"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 GA.Value.getValueType(),</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2285"><Highlight kind="normal">      GA.Weight = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">SHL</a>.Weight; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Specifically ignore the GA weight here</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2286"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeHeights&#91;GA.Value&#93; = Height;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2287"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2288"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2289"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2290"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GA.Value.getNode())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2291"><Highlight kind="normal">    Leaves.push(GA);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2292"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2293"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is the top level and we haven&#39;t factored out a shift, we should try</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2294"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to move a constant to the bottom to match addressing modes like memw(rX+C)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TopLevel &amp;&amp; !CanFactorize &amp;&amp; Leaves.hasConst()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2296"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;--&gt; Pushing constant to tip of tree.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2297"><Highlight kind="normal">    Leaves.pushToBottom(Leaves.pop());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2298"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2299"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DataLayout &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getDataLayout();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2301"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetLowering &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a1ed864be04c93653277b0f5112a4f305">TLI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#af5bffbb8254140e8679a9b7c0766f9e2">getTargetLowering</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2302"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2303"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rebuild the tree using Huffman&#39;s algorithm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2304"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Leaves.size() &gt; 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2305"><Highlight kind="normal">    WeightedLeaf L0 = Leaves.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2306"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2307"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See whether we can grab a MUL to form an add(Rx,mpyi(Ry,#u6)),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2308"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// otherwise just get the next leaf</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2309"><Highlight kind="normal">    WeightedLeaf L1 = Leaves.findMULbyConst();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2310"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!L1.Value.getNode())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2311"><Highlight kind="normal">      L1 = Leaves.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2312"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2313"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(L0.Weight &lt;= L1.Weight &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Priority queue is broken!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2314"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2315"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> V0 = L0.Value;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2316"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V0Weight = L0.Weight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2317"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> V1 = L1.Value;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V1Weight = L1.Weight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2319"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2320"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure that none of these nodes have been RAUW&#39;d</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2321"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((RootWeights.count(V0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()) &amp;&amp; RootWeights&#91;V0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()&#93; == -2) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2322"><Highlight kind="normal">        (RootWeights.count(V1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()) &amp;&amp; RootWeights&#91;V1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>()&#93; == -2)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2324"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> balanceSubTree(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, TopLevel);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2325"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2326"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2329"><Highlight kind="normal">    EVT VT = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getValueType(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2330"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> NewNode;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2331"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2332"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (V0C &amp;&amp; !V1C) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2333"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(V0, V1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2334"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(V0C, V1C);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate height of this node</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2338"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NodeHeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(V0) &amp;&amp; NodeHeights.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a53408c95a7bfb5443b43fb2134c3eb23">count</a>(V1) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2340"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Height = std::max(NodeHeights&#91;V0&#93;, NodeHeights&#91;V1&#93;) + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2341"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2342"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rebuild this node (and restore SHL from MUL if needed)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2343"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (V1C &amp;&amp; NOpcode == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad8aec9273962cf78d087090c11a1dd1c">ISD::MUL</a> &amp;&amp; V1C-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantsdnode/#a74b17cf9d0ee8268a5b38bbb896a30ba">getAPIntValue</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad1b0513de876d1c85cf6268ca21b2c86">isPowerOf2</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2345"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>, SDLoc(V0), VT, V0,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2349"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2351"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><Highlight kind="normal">    NodeHeights&#91;NewNode&#93; = Height;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a> = V0Weight + V1Weight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2355"><Highlight kind="normal">    Leaves.push(WeightedLeaf(NewNode, Weight, L0.InsertionOrder));</Highlight></CodeLine>
